mapper.insert: insert into borrow_record(book_id, user_id, borrow_date) values (#{bookID}, #{userID}, #{borrowDate})
mapper.select: select * from book where book_id in ( select book_id from borrow_record where user_id = #{userID} )
SELECT br.book_id, br.user_id, b.book_name, b.book_author, br.borrow_date FROM borrow_record br LEFT JOIN book b ON br.book_id = b.book_id WHERE br.user_id = #{userID}
